pullrequest.title: Fix compile error due gazebo::common::Color and sdformat

content.raw:
I think this is ready to be merged. While the builds are all unstable, there are no new test failures/cppcheck issues/compiler warnings.

1.  [gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia 310](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/310)
    1. 4/5 failures are also in [build 303](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/303/) which is a different branch
    1. UNIT_IntrospectionCurveHandler_TEST is known to be flaky #2121
1. [gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none 644](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/644/)
    1. No test failures
    1. unstable to due existing cppcheck warnings not introduced by this PR
1. [gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64 1218](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1218)
    1. Every test failure is also in [build 1211](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1211/) which is a different branch
1. [gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64 1895](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1895)
    1. The mountain of compiler warnings are all in [build 1887](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1887/) which is a different branch
content.html:
I think this is ready to be merged. While the builds are all unstable, there are no new test failures/cppcheck issues/compiler warnings.

  1. gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia 310
    1. 4/5 failures are also in build 303 which is a different branch
    2. UNIT_IntrospectionCurveHandler_TEST is known to be flaky #2121
  2. gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none 644
    1. No test failures
    2. unstable to due existing cppcheck warnings not introduced by this PR
  3. gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64 1218
    1. Every test failure is also in build 1211 which is a different branch
  4. gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64 1895
    1. The mountain of compiler warnings are all in build 1887 which is a different branch
